a1: The tool adjusts the crop box of each page, which defines the visible area. Content outside the crop box is hidden but not permanently deleted â€” the original data remains in the file.
q2: Can I set different margins for each page?
a2: Currently the same margins are applied to all pages. For per-page adjustments, use the PDF Editor tool with its page-level controls.
a3: All processing happens in your browser. Your files never leave your device.
